text: @lloydblankfein Folks, Your loved ones and friends may have to die, so @realDonaldTrump can be re-elected, so he can make his friends and kids richer, thus his evangelical cronies can eulogize you for a fee..and Fox News can blame Obama for not reading her e-mail. #coronavirus  #TrumpDepression
